Title: Ladies Sekonda wave design three piece watch set 4037G.AHV
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Ladies Sekonda wave design three piece watch set 4037G.AHV RRP £69.99 Now £44.99 Description This three piece Sekonda set features a watch, bracelet and pendant all with a beautiful wave and crystal design. The watch has a 18mm wide oval Mother of Pearl dial and slim strap which matches the bracelet. The pendant has a simple crystal set wave with a 21mm drop on a 18" sparkling flat curb chain. The set looks elegant all together as a set or split up to wear a different piece everyday. We are authorised stockists of Sekonda, and this set comes in the official, original packaging and with a 2 year manufacturer's warranty for the watch.
